name: Kz NTools : Fix Your Network
description: Kz NTools is a powerfull network tool. Kz Ntools will ease your network usage and fix your issues.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 (64 Bit) Processor: Any dual core CPU or higher. Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit) Processor: Any dual core CPU or higher. Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space
